apple_vendor_description: Apple's depiction of this kiss emoji showcases two individuals with medium-light and medium-dark skin tones sharing a passionate kiss, all rendered with Apple's characteristic smooth shading and soft, rounded forms. The realistic lighting accentuates the gentle curves of their faces and the tender moment, conveying warmth and deep affection. This inclusive representation, a hallmark of Apple's emoji design, signifies romantic love and partnership across diverse skin tones.
